nodes.text: The Rapid Response Team was a unit of the New Republic Senate Planetary Intelligence Network (SPIN). Composed of Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa Solo, Han Solo, and Lando Calrissian, the unit was to be used for secret operations. However, as all the members of the group were well known, the team was not as effective as had been planned. SPIN was later disbanded and its resources taken over by the New Republic Intelligence Service.
